tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** **** ******* ** *** ****** ********* ******************* **** ******* * ****** I had a painful gum swelling around an RCT site which started becoming quite bothersome and I was looking out for an experienced dentist /periodontist. And I must say I was really lucky to have visited Dr Vinay for this. The tooth had cracked under previous RCT crown, and it had to be carefully extracted surgically. The whole procedure went smooth and almost pain free and recovery/healing was great. Why I would highly recommend Dr Vinay to anyone seeking dental help -
- Straightforward & clear in his approach & thinking
- Super quick in diagnostics and recommends the right line of treatment
- very friendly, reachable on phone, accessible/ approachable. You're in safe hands with him
- Careful & diligent during the procedure ensuring patient is kept informed and it goes smoothly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a wonderful experience visiting Medics Dental care, which I visited for dental implants. The clinic had a brilliant ambiance, and the staff was very welcoming. Loved the way they are taking care of their patients with a smile on their faces. Dr. Vinay has given me a clear explanation of the process and most importantly he gave me financial training with good clarity. I liked his way of explanation and proceeded further with the dental implant process. The whole process is done by the doctor himself and the team, and the process is painless and fast. They have well-equipped facilities with all state-of-the-art equipment. I highly recommend the clinic to my friends, and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Due to my busy schedules, I did not take my oral care properly, which resulted in strong yellowish plaque on my teeth. So, I visited this clinic for teeth whitening. Dr. Vinay considered my appointment, and I am very happy to meet and take treatment from him. He is very courteous, communicative, and practical. He has given me useful and practical suggestions about oral care. In one sitting, all my plaque is gone, and I felt amazing that the whole process is painless and took one and half hour only. Thank you, doctor. I highly recommend Dr. Vinay and his team for your dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thru friends referral visited Elite Dental Clinic. After meeting Dr Vinay Ram never felt that we are meeting for the first time and immediately was feeling so comfortable. The teeth problem was very lucidly explained and treatment done. All queries were very satisfactorily taken care of and now I am at home. The clinical atmosphere also is very attractive and nice. Very satisfactory experience and I think not only a Doctor I have found a friend in Dr Vinay. Must visit which is quite affordable too for all teeth related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Vinay and his team were very professional in examining and providing solutions. I had to do fillings with new crowns and redo my existing crowns as the previous crown was done at another place making trouble. He has done a great job and sorted out my dental issue in a professional manner. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited this Clinic with a main complaint of pain in my lower teeth. Dr. Vinay was really kind & explained the entire treatment plan so perfectly with much patience. He has done my procedure professionally and I was comfortable throughout the entire process.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Painless Single visit root canal treatment,
review: Dr. Vinay is very friendly, and he explained the treatment process very well. Further, he explained me various options for treatment and procedures for each type of treatment method. The clinic's staff is also very professional and friendly. The clinic environment and staff made me comfortable before and during the procedure. And the main thing to say is the total process was painless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Vinay ram is an eminent practitioner with great skills. His friendly nature made it easier for me to coordinate with him. The treatments provided in elite dental care is worth your money.The ambience of the clinic made me feel great. Thumbs up to Dr. Vinay ramüëç.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Had sever tooth pain, could'nt sleep whole night and visited Dr. Vinay Ram the next day. Doctor took enough time in examining and explaning my condition and treated me, there was immediate pain relief post treatment. Was really happy with the treatment. Later in one more appointment my treatment was completed.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,Misaligned Teeth,
review: Dr. Vinay was very amiable and had taken time to explain my condition... he asked clarifying questions to get to the root cause and treat accordingly.. he gave me clear instructions on how to take care of my condition (sensitivity) and also explained what to expect.. overall I am satisfied with my experience and would recommend him to my friends!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor Vinay was very friendly.  He patiently listened to my problem and after thorough examination doctor explained my condition and told me the treatment options. Root Canal treatment was performed to the perfection. Im very much convinced with the treatment andI would definitely recommend Dr Vinay for any type  of dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
In my opinion, Dr. Vinay is a very kind, patient, and supportive doctor. He offers the best advice, explains the procedure, acts quickly, and works to relieve tooth discomfort. He doesn't leave you waiting in the course of the treatment for too long.

My teeth were shaking so badly. I suffered while eating and drinking too. After checking my teeth, he said one of my teeth is in bad condition and going for removal is the best. The other tooth which was shaking too, he said that it was minor and just painkillers will do fine. He was right! The extraction was painless and I'm happy with that. Great dentist who knows what to do.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Vinay Rams clinic Elite at Narsingi is the best place for dental problems. I recommend every one to go by and see for yourself. Very kind and highly attentive to any concern dealing with your dental problems. No worries, you won't have to wait long in and out. I had gaps in my front teeth. Dr Vinay Ram and Dr Sree Suma thoroughly explained all the things going on with my teeth, recommended ceramic braces and fixed them. They made me feel so comfortable and at ease. I highly recommend them to all my friends and relatives. Thanks a lot Dr Vinay Ram and Dr Sree Suma for your dedicated services. Give you guys a thumbs up! *** *** *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr K.Vinay Ram is a wonderful Dentist. Me and my husband have been going to his clinic at Nagole and Narsingi since 2 years.I had gaps and uneven teeth.He along with the help of Dr K. Sree Suma suggested me ceramic Braces and fixed them.They are professionals and spectacular in every aspect. They are Honest,gentle,caring and are very relaxed in their work. I certainly recommend Dr K. Vinay Ram and Dr K. Sree Suma to any and everybody, fees they charge is very reasonable and more service oriented. They give quality and a shine in your smile . I also took my daughter and son recently for removal of wisdom teeth and for fixing ceramic Braces. I highly recommend Dr K. Vinay Ram and Dr K. Sree Suma clinic at Narsingi. Thanks a lot to you young Doctors for the wonderful work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Scalling,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
Dr. Vinay is a very good listener and tries to imbibe on what a patient wants to communicate. I could very well get into a comfort zone after an elaborated conversation with him. He did elaborate me his meticulous treatment procedure and I was also impressed with the modern equipments he has with him. 

While I was undergoing treatment he did take care of minute details and also sensed of any discomfort I was having and checked on regularly. 

I was a bit skeptical as per my nature until I get really satisfied so took my time to thank Dr. Vinay for his unconditional commitment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I went to this clinic for my wisdom tooth extraction. Took an appointment prior and got treated on time. Dr. Vinay Ram did the extraction with utmost care and precision. No more pain or complications. Will highly recommend it to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Vinay was very patient and asked us the history of the issue. He took his time in investigating and diagnosing the issue. Treatment was quick and satisfactory.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Approached Dr. Vinay for wisdom teeth extraction, which was done with utmost care and is totally painless. After the procedure, Vinay sir‚Äôs team guided me on the right medication and overall, it was a good painless experience. Big thanks to Dr. Vinay.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Medics Dental Care for wisdom tooth extraction. Doctors here are friendly and explain things in detail. During the time of extraction, Dr. Vinay controlled my fear assuring he is in safe hands, thereby reducing anxiety.
He took time to clearly explain precautions to take care of after the treatment and to avoid future problems. Pricing is also affordable I can say. I fully recommend this clinic to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very friendly and explained every detail of the issue. The treatment options were also discussed. The clinic is well equipped, I didn't have to go to another place for x-rays!!! Overall very satisfied that we have a great dental clinic at the location very close to where I reside. Would recommend Dr Vinays service whole heartedly.
